subject: Basketball (College)
Football (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Several prominent conferences are exploring the possibility of making athletes ineligible to play men’s basketball and football during their freshman years to discourage the so-called one-and-done phenomenon.
snippet: Several prominent conferences are exploring the possibility of making athletes ineligible to play men’s basketball and football during their freshman years to discourage the so-called one-and-done phenomenon.
